column4: How do I disable the pcspeaker completely? I have tried sudo modprobe -r pcspkr, but it does not help. I am using headphones and it is really loud when the pc speaker beeps in them. I get a shock each time.
alternatively set "bell-style" in your readline config
I do *not* want any kind of beep right now. Not from the pcspeaker. Not from a sound file.
